nodes.text: A zerape was a type of poncho-like cloak that was commonly worn by residents of the Outer Rim Territories during the time of the New Republic. In 19 ABY, the Jedi Master Mander Zuma and the spacers Reen Irana and Eddey Be'ray traveled to the planet Endregaad on a mission to search for the missing Hutt Mika Anjiliac, and on arrival on the world Irana gave Zuma a zerape, so that he could blend in with the local inhabitants.
